api_list.name: /block_info
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a specific block
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com/block_info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com/block_info"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

abs_slot.description: Absolute slot number of the block

epoch_slot.description: Slot number of the block in epoch

tx_count.description: Number of transactions in the block

vrf_key.description: VRF key of the block producer

op_cert.description: Hash of the block producers' operational certificate

op_cert_counter.description: Counter value of the operational certificate used to create this block

pool.description: Pool ID in bech32 format (null for pre-Shelley blocks)

total_output.description: Total output of the block (in lovelace)

total_fees.description: Total fees of the block (in lovelace)

num_confirmations.description: Number of confirmations for the block

parent_hash.description: Hash of the parent of this block

child_hash.description: Hash of the child of this block (if present)

epoch_slot.description: Slot number of the block in epoch

absolute_slot.description: Absolute slot number of the block

total_output.description: Total sum of all transaction outputs (in lovelaces)

deposit.description: Total Deposits included in transaction (for example, if it is registering a pool/key)

invalid_before.description: Slot before which transaction cannot be validated (if supplied, else null)

invalid_after.description: Slot after which transaction cannot be validated

collateral_inputs.description: An array of UTxO outputs created by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

datum_hash.description: Hash of datum (if any) connected to UTxO

inline_datum.description: Allows datums to be attached to UTxO (CIP-32)

reference_script.description: Allow reference scripts to be used to satisfy script requirements during validation, rather than requiring the spending transaction to do so. (CIP-33)

asset_list.description: An array of assets on the UTxO

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of assets on the UTxO

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

datum_hash.description: Hash of datum (if any) connected to UTxO

inline_datum.description: Allows datums to be attached to UTxO (CIP-32)

reference_script.description: Allow reference scripts to be used to satisfy script requirements during validation, rather than requiring the spending transaction to do so. (CIP-33)

asset_list.description: An array of assets on the UTxO

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of assets on the UTxO

reference_inputs.description: An array of UTxO outputs created by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

datum_hash.description: Hash of datum (if any) connected to UTxO

inline_datum.description: Allows datums to be attached to UTxO (CIP-32)

reference_script.description: Allow reference scripts to be used to satisfy script requirements during validation, rather than requiring the spending transaction to do so. (CIP-33)

asset_list.description: An array of assets on the UTxO

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of assets on the UTxO

inputs.description: An array of UTxO outputs created by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

datum_hash.description: Hash of datum (if any) connected to UTxO

inline_datum.description: Allows datums to be attached to UTxO (CIP-32)

reference_script.description: Allow reference scripts to be used to satisfy script requirements during validation, rather than requiring the spending transaction to do so. (CIP-33)

asset_list.description: An array of assets on the UTxO

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of assets on the UTxO

outputs.description: An array of UTxO outputs created by the transaction

bech32.description: A Cardano payment/base address (bech32 encoded) where funds were sent or change to be returned

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

tx_index.description: Index of UTxO in the transaction

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO

datum_hash.description: Hash of datum (if any) connected to UTxO

inline_datum.description: Allows datums to be attached to UTxO (CIP-32)

reference_script.description: Allow reference scripts to be used to satisfy script requirements during validation, rather than requiring the spending transaction to do so. (CIP-33)

asset_list.description: An array of assets on the UTxO

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of assets on the UTxO

withdrawals.description: Array of withdrawals with-in a transaction

stake_addr.description: A Cardano staking address (reward account, bech32 encoded)

assets_minted.description: Array of minted assets with-in a transaction

fingerprint.description: The CIP14 fingerprint of the asset

quantity.description: Quantity of minted assets (negative on burn)

metadata.description: A JSON array containing details about metadata within transaction

certificates.description: Certificates present with-in a transaction (if any)

type.description: Type of certificate (could be delegation, stake_registration, stake_deregistraion, pool_update, pool_retire, param_proposal, reserve_MIR, treasury_MIR)

info.description: A JSON array containing information from the certificate

native_scripts.description: Native scripts present in a transaction (if any)

script_json.description: JSON representation of the timelock script (null for other script types)

plutus_contracts.description: Plutus contracts present in transaction (if any)

size.description: The size of the CBOR serialised script (in bytes)

valid_contract.description: True if the contract is valid or there is no contract

purpose.description: What kind of validation this redeemer is used for

fee.description: The budget in fees to run a script - the fees depend on the ExUnits and the current prices

hash.description: The Hash of the Plutus Data

value.description: The actual data in json format

total_balance.description: Total balance of the account including UTxO, rewards and MIRs (in lovelace)

utxo.description: Total UTxO balance of the account

rewards.description: Total rewards earned by the account

withdrawals.description: Total rewards withdrawn by the account

reserves.description: Total reserves MIR value of the account

treasury.description: Total treasury MIR value of the account

api_list.name: /tx_utxos
api_list.description: Get UTxO set (inputs/outputs) of transactions.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com/tx_utxos"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cardanos-decentralized-api-preprod.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

allOf.description: Cardano staking address (reward account) in bech32 format

value.description: Total sum of ADA on the UTxO
